title: "The 'I word.' Can you imagine?" with Leigh Ann Caldwell and Kimberly Atkins
description: In a dramatic appearance at the White House Rose Garden, President Trump attacked Democrats over Congressional investigations. Plus, the cultural wars return, and Joe Biden sets the pace.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
